         <eb:From>
            <eb:PartyId type="urn:x12.org:IO5:01">1212</eb:PartyId>
         </eb:From>
         <eb:To>
            <eb:PartyId type="urn:x12.org:IO5:01">2323</eb:PartyId>
         </eb:To>
         <eb:CPAId>92RG</eb:CPAId>
         <eb:ConversationId>1234567</eb:ConversationId>
         <eb:Service eb:type="OTA">TravelItineraryAddInfoLLSRQ</eb:Service>
         <eb:Action>TravelItineraryAddInfoLLSRQ</eb:Action>
         <eb:MessageData>
            <eb:MessageId>1001</eb:MessageId>
            <eb:Timestamp>2012-06-07T10:00:01</eb:Timestamp>
            <eb:TimeToLive>2013-06-06T23:59:59</eb:TimeToLive>
         </eb:MessageData>
      </eb:MessageHeader>
      <wsse:Security xmlns:wsse="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/secext" xmlns:wsu="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/utility">
         <wsse:BinarySecurityToken valueType="String" EncodingType="wsse:Base64Binary">Shared/IDL:IceSess\/SessMgr:1\.0.IDL/Common/!ICESMS\/ACPCRTD!ICESMSLB\/CRT.LB!1545134624501!3067!5</wsse:BinarySecurityToken>
      </wsse:Security>
   </SOAP-ENV:Header>
   <SOAP-ENV:Body>
      <TravelItineraryAddInfoRQ Version="1.9.1" xmlns="http://webservices.sabre.com/sabreXML/2003/07" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
         <POS>
            <Source PseudoCityCode="${#Project#Organization}"/>
         </POS>
         <CustomerInfo>
            <PersonName TravelerRefNumber="1.1">
               <GivenName>UserGivenName</GivenName>
               <Surname>UserSurname</Surname>
               <NameReference Text="REF1"/>
            </PersonName>
            <Telephone AreaCityCode="817" PhoneNumber="555-1212" PhoneUseType="H" TravelerRefNumber="1.1"/>
            <Email EmailAddress="email@email.com" TravelerRefNumber="1.1"/>
            <CustomerIdentifier Identifier="1234567890"/>
         </CustomerInfo>
         <AgencyInfo>
            <Address>
               <TPA_Extensions>
                  <AgencyName>SABRE TRAVEL</AgencyName>
               </TPA_Extensions>
               <StreetNmbr>3150 SABRE DRIVE</StreetNmbr>
               <CityName>SOUTHLAKE</CityName>
               <PostalCode>76092</PostalCode>
               <StateCountyProv StateCode="TX"/>
               <CountryName Code="US"/>
            </Address>
            <Telephone AreaCityCode="817" PhoneNumber="555-1212" PhoneUseType="A"/>
            <Ticketing TicketType="7T-"/>
         </AgencyInfo>
      </TravelItineraryAddInfoRQ>
   </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

   <SOAP-ENV:Body>
      <v3:EnhancedAirBookRQ version="3.2.0" HaltOnError="true" IgnoreOnError="true">
         <v3:OTA_AirBookRQ>
            <v3:OriginDestinationInformation>
               <v3:FlightSegment ArrivalDateTime="2019-03-24T04:40:00" DepartureDateTime="2019-03-23T18:40:00" FlightNumber="1305" NumberInParty="1" ResBookDesigCode="G" Status="NN">
                  <v3:DestinationLocation LocationCode="EZE"/>
                  <v3:Equipment AirEquipType="330"/>
                  <v3:MarketingAirline Code="AR" FlightNumber="1305"/>
                  <v3:MarriageGrp Ind="false"/>

               </v3:FlightSegment>
               <v3:FlightSegment ArrivalDateTime="2019-03-24T09:25:00" DepartureDateTime="2019-03-24T07:10:00" FlightNumber="2280" NumberInParty="1" ResBookDesigCode="G" Status="NN">
                  <v3:DestinationLocation LocationCode="SCL"/>
                  <v3:Equipment AirEquipType="E90"/>
                  <v3:MarketingAirline Code="AR" FlightNumber="2280"/>
                  <v3:MarriageGrp Ind="true"/>
                  <v3:OperatingAirline Code="AU"/>
                  <v3:OriginLocation LocationCode="EZE"/>
               </v3:FlightSegment>
               <v3:FlightSegment ArrivalDateTime="2019-03-30T20:15:00" DepartureDateTime="2019-03-30T18:20:00" FlightNumber="2287" NumberInParty="1" ResBookDesigCode="G" Status="NN">
                  <v3:DestinationLocation LocationCode="EZE"/>
                  <v3:Equipment AirEquipType="E90"/>
                  <v3:MarketingAirline Code="AR" FlightNumber="2287"/>
                  <v3:MarriageGrp Ind="false"/>
                  <v3:OperatingAirline Code="AU"/>

               </v3:FlightSegment>
               <v3:FlightSegment ArrivalDateTime="2019-03-31T07:25:00" DepartureDateTime="2019-03-30T23:15:00" FlightNumber="1302" NumberInParty="1" ResBookDesigCode="G" Status="NN">
                  <v3:DestinationLocation LocationCode="MIA"/>

               </v3:FlightSegment>
            </v3:OriginDestinationInformation>

</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
